title: Flask And Stopper, ca. 1906
markings: Marks: Hall marks: Lion rampart, lion head, "1" Makers's mark: "JPSs" in shaped shield.
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds, in memory of Dona Guimaraes
description: Bottle (a) has flattened circular body with tall narrow neck, applied crimped rim one third way up neck. Four loops of white each side of body. Cover (b) of silver with cork insert; tall, cylindrical in shape, molded rim at base, four teardrop repoussé ornaments on sides; top with round finial, rising from flattened circular collar, four tear drop repoussé ornaments radiating pit from finial.

tombstone.epitaph:
Flask And Stopper, ca. 1906.
ca. 1906. Glass, silver. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds, in memory of Dona Guimaraes. 1993-52-1-a,b.
